Directions: In a mixing bowl, cream shortening and brown sugar.  Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.  Combine water and coffee; set aside.  Combine the flour, baking powder and baking soda; add to creamed mixture alternately with coffee.  Stir in the chocolate chips. Refrigerate for 1 hour.
Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 in. apart onto greased baking sheets.  Bake at 350 degrees F for 10-12 minutes or until golden around the edges.  Remove to wire racks.
